en: C.C.C. workers on the ring and chow gong, C.C.C. Co. 417, Ivy, Tennessee

In this photograph, Civilian Conservation Corps workers pose on the ring and chow gong at C.C.C. Company 417, in Ivy, Tennessee. On the back of the photograph, the people in photo are identified as Joe Givins, Calvin Robinson, Jack Pitts, Leo Decker, and Charles Rutherford. The dates are inferred from Charles Rutherford's promotion certificates.
Tennessee Valley Authority and "grass roots democracy"
